QuestData.Title: Runas Knows the Way
QuestData.Description: I wish to make it up to you for whatever I did that made you want to kill me.$b$bHmm... your dragon complains about being weak. I know why. Runas can fix it, my friend.$b$bOne of my kind, Ael'Yith, pulls ley energy from the very ground of Azsuna. I can take you to the location of his mana siphons.$b$bIt's not too late to undo the harm the others have done. You've done well to trust me.
QuestData.RewardText: They're tapping into the ley lines?
